About Me

Let me tell you about a few things...

BIO

I'm a 23-year old front-end developer focused on building products with Javascript, specifically React. Besides that i take a keen interest in UI design. Given that producing a modern website requires the combination of design and server technology, i believe having experience in both allows the most optimal user experience.

When i am not coding, i am likely playing my guitar or busy working on my blog and fiddling with images in photoshop.
